full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` 'OD DPAG MED KYI SGRUBS THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,ZHES 'OD DPAG MED KYI SGRUB THABS SHIN TU BSDUS PA 'DI NI DAD SHIR DANG LDAN PA'I THU NU MAL DAR @004B KHANG DGE SLONG GI 'DOD PA LTAR, DZA YA PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SKAD GNYIS SMRA BA SOGS CHOS LA BLO MIG RGYAS PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG DON GRUB AER TE NI GUSHR'I'O,, ,,
